markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Magic Hide](/Spells.aspx?ID=1865)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 383 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** your animal companion
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your animal companion grows a thicker hide, matted fur, or a harder shell, granting it a +1 status bonus to AC.
name: Magic Hide
